name: Alfred Loewy
content:
Alfred Loewy (20 June 1873 – 25 January 1935) was a German mathematician who worked on representation theory. Loewy rings, Loewy length, Loewy decomposition and Loewy series are named after him.
 His graduate students included Wolfgang Krull and Friedrich Karl Schmidt.
 
 This article about a German mathematician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.

raw:
German mathematician
 Alfred Loewy
Alfred Loewy (20 June 1873 – 25 January 1935) was a German mathematician who worked on representation theory. Loewy rings, Loewy length, Loewy decomposition and Loewy series are named after him.
His graduate students included Wolfgang Krull and Friedrich Karl Schmidt.

Books[edit]
Versicherungsmathematik, 1903[1]4th ed. 1924.[2]
Lehrbuch der Algebra, 1915
Grundlagen der Arithmetik 1915
Mathematik des Geld- und Zahlungsverkehrs, 1920[3]
Notes[edit]


^ Epsteen, Saul (1904). "Review: Versicherungsmathematik, by A. Loewy". Bull. Amer. Math. Soc. 11 (1): 21–24. doi:10.1090/s0002-9904-1904-01186-6.

^ Glover, James Waterman (1926). "Review: Versicherungsmathematik, 4th ed., by A. Loewy". Bull. Amer. Math. Soc. 32 (6): 714–715. doi:10.1090/s0002-9904-1926-04308-1.

^ Crathorne, Arthur Robert (1922). "Review: Mathematik des Geld- und Zahlungsverkehrs, by A. Loewy". Bull. Amer. Math. Soc. 28 (1): 65. doi:10.1090/s0002-9904-1922-03519-7.


References[edit]
O'Connor, John J.; Robertson, Edmund F., "Alfred Loewy", MacTutor History of Mathematics archive, University of St Andrews.
Alfred Loewy at the Mathematics Genealogy Project
Volker R. Remmert: Zur Mathematikgeschichte in Freiburg. Alfred Loewy (1873-1935): Jähes Ende späten Glanzes, in: Freiburger Universitätsblätter 129(1995), 81-102
